channel.title: Npc training
channel.description: Does anyone know exactly how I could add npc training? What I want to do is make it so that when a player is attacking an npc, it gives them xp in a combat skill. Like if they are using mage, it gives them mage xp, if they are using stab-attack xp, crush-str xp, block-def xp, etc. I really need to know how to do this, thx and all help appreciated.

item.title: Npc training
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

Where would this be in? My server has xp given when you attack an npc, but i can’t find it anywhere in client.java or npchandler.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc training
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

sp3c:

Ok after attacking a few npcs, I realized I do get xp from them like I want. But the thing is, it’s the exact same speed as rs2 and that’s SLOW! So how can I change the amount of xp given when attacking?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc training
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Budda:

Dude. You are obviously not smart enough to be making a server from scratch, and as far as I know, wL’s first server, the one that most people will have, has combat. So, wtf are you doing?

Budda’s right. Look at the source, and see how it is coded. Then once you try it out yourself you will have it, instead of copy & pasting it, and OMG??? Copy & paste, so what? Pretty much every server is like that…or am i wrong?

Read full topic
